name: Pacifist Dungeon DEMO
description:
Can you beat a trap filled dungeon teeming with monsters, armed only with....

NO WEAPONRY WHATSOEVER?

....You might say "No way!" ....but you'll be surprised at how far you can get.

Play as The Monk, trapped in this cavernous dungeon, trying to escape.

Armed with your incredibly useful dodge roll, you'll be travelling through three different "zones" of the dungeon, which is the domain of a different Cardinal Sin.

WHAT THIS DEMO CONTAINS:

^Full Keyboard and Controller Compatibility!

^Three Zones out of Eight are completed, and so these three completed sones are featured in the DEMO.

In this DEMO, you can face on the normal, trap filled dungeon, with no special modifiers, and you can try out the Wrath Modifier levels, and the Lust Modifier levels.

WHAT THIS DEMO ALSO CONTAINS:

^A soundtrack made by your truly!

^Art also made.... by yours truly!

^Levels designed by @art_by_olivia_jean!  (Instagram Username

^Playtesting by @a_cactus_smoothie!  (Instagram Username)

The game will be re-released with the full set of levels when the work on them are completed.

^Also, you can comment on this page to give recommendations on what modifiers YOU want players of the full game to have to deal with for the other unfinished zones!
